inlines.text: Solvency Statement in relation to the Amalgamated Company
Pursuant to Section 215D(5) of the Companies Act

fields.name: Date of authorization
fields.question: Date of authorization from the board of directors to make the solvency statement
fields.help: The director making the solvency statement must be authorised by the board of directors.

fields.name: Name of the surviving company
fields.question: Name of the surviving company
fields.help: This is the amalgamating company that will dissolve after amalgamation.
